invite_step.title: Invite people to {{ project }}
invite_step.instructions: Start typing a name, username or email.
invite_step.alternative: You can also enter multiple email addresses separated by a comma.
invite_step.error_add_email: Add at least an email or username
invite_step.error_missing_people: There are people not added to the list. Add them and try again.
invite_step.error_add_least_one: Add at least one person to the list
invite_step.error_several_emails: There are one or more invalid email addresses.
invite_step.error_more_than_fifty: You can only invite 50 people at once. Remove { invitations, plural, one {1 user} other {# users} } and try again.
invite_step.invitation_success: Your { invitations, plural, one { invitation was } other { # invitations were } } successfully sent!
invite_step.failed_send_invite: Failed to send { invitations, plural, one { the invitation. } other {# invitations.} } Please try again in a few minutes.
